title: Define System Architecture
description: Create a high-level design of the system architecture for the real-time augmented reality platform.

title: Design Real-time Data Processing System
description: Develop a design for real-time data processing to handle augmented reality experiences for thousands of users simultaneously.

title: Design Low-latency Rendering System
description: Create a design for the low-latency rendering system needed to deliver augmented reality experiences.

title: Develop Distributed Communication Protocol
description: Design and implement a distributed communication protocol for data exchange between the platform components.

title: Create User Interface Design for AR Experiences
description: Design an intuitive and visually appealing user interface for the augmented reality experiences.

title: Develop Security Measures for Platform Components
description: Implement appropriate security measures to protect user data and prevent unauthorized access.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Write comprehensive technical documentation for the platform, including architecture, APIs, and usage guidelines.
